character.Street Samurai: A woman with cybernetic eye implants, sharp angular features, tech-enhanced beauty, neon-lit tattoos
character.Corporate Hacker: A woman with neural interface ports, sleek modern features, digital makeup, augmented reality contacts
character.Neon Rebel: A woman with holographic hair streaks, bold makeup, anti-corporate style, fierce independence

scene.Neon Alley: in a rain-soaked cyberpunk alley with holographic ads, during neon-lit midnight
scene.Rooftop Club: on a high-rise rooftop bar with city sprawl below, during purple neon night
scene.Tech District: in a futuristic market district with floating screens, during blue hour with digital billboards

emotion.Tech Confidence: cool calculated presence, leaning against cyber-wall, data-scrolling eyes, digital swagger
emotion.Hacker Focus: intense concentration, fingers mid-gesture, AR interface interaction, cyber-engaged
emotion.Street Survivor: wary but strong, defensive stance, scanning surroundings, street-hardened

wardrobe.Tech Jacket: wearing a synthetic leather jacket with LED strips, smart fabric pants, holographic accessories
wardrobe.Corporate Sleek: wearing a form-fitting bodysuit with fiber optics, reflective materials, minimalist tech fashion
wardrobe.Street Punk: wearing repurposed tech gear, neon highlights, DIY cybernetic style, urban survival wear

photography.Neon Glow: vibrant neon light reflections in rain, pink and blue glow, cyberpunk atmosphere
photography.Holographic Haze: soft holographic projections, digital artifacts in air, futuristic ambient light
photography.City Night: skyscraper lights background, neon signs bleeding, urban dystopia mood

technical.Cyberpunk 50mm: shot on 50mm lens, neon bokeh, sharp focus with chromatic aberration, futuristic
technical.Urban Night: shot on 35mm lens, neon light pollution, cinematic sci-fi look, professional cyberpunk
technical.FLUX Cyber: raw photo, photorealistic cyberpunk, detailed tech elements, professional neon photography
